DOC.brief_summary: PF-04620110 novel compound propose treatment Type 2 diabetes mellitus . The primary purpose trial evaluate safety tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics , multiple oral dos PF-04620110 .
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Dose Study Of PF-04620110 In Overweight And Obese , Otherwise Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 26.5 35.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) disease clinical finding screen .
